NetSparkleUpdater.​Downloaders.​WebRequestAppCastDataDownloader
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IAppCastDataDownloader
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​Downloaders.​WebRequestAppCastDataDownloader

Class that takes care of downloading data for an app cast, including the app cast itself as well as the app cast signature (if available). Allows you to send extra JSON with your request for the app cast information.

Variables
_appcastUrl
private string _appcastUrl
Functions
WebRequestAppCastDataDownloader
public WebRequestAppCastDataDownloader()

Default constructor for the app cast data downloader. Basically does nothing. :)

Properties
TrustEverySSLConnection
public bool TrustEverySSLConnection { get; set }

If true, don't check the validity of SSL certificates. Defaults to false.

ExtraJsonData
public string ExtraJsonData { get; set }

If not "", sends extra JSON via POST to server with the web request for update information and for the app cast signature.

Functions
DownloadAndGetAppCastData
public string DownloadAndGetAppCastData(
string url
)
GetAppCastEncoding
public Encoding GetAppCastEncoding()
GetWebContentResponse
public WebResponse GetWebContentResponse(
string url
)

Download the app cast from the given URL.  Performs a GET request by default. If ExtraJsonData is set, uses a POST request and sends the JSON data along with the request.

Parameter
url
string

the URL to download the app cast from

Returns

the response from the web server if creating the request succeeded; null otherwise. The response is not guaranteed to have succeeded!

ValidateRemoteCertificate
private bool ValidateRemoteCertificate(
object sender,
X509Certificate certificate,
X509Chain chain,
SslPolicyErrors sslPolicyErrors
)

Determine if the remote X509 certificate is valid

Parameters
sender
object

the web request that is being made

certificate
X509Certificate

the certificate

chain
X509Chain

the chain

sslPolicyErrors
SslPolicyErrors

any SSL policy errors that have occurred

Returns

true if the cert is valid; false otherwise
